short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Official FoxChat Extension for Google Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Official FoxChat Extension for Google Chrome. This extension provides quick and easy access to FoxChat.
Supported Browsers:
-    FoxChat for Google Chrome: (Comming soon)
-    FoxChat for Mozilla Firefox: https://addons.mozilla.org/addon/foxchat/
